title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: AAVE Jumps 7.4%, Leading Index Higher
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Ethereum (ETH) was also a top performer, gaining 2.9% From Thursday
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3238.87, up 1.3% (+41.2) since 4 p.m. ET on Thursday.

Nineteen of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: AAVE (+7.4%) and ETH (+2.9%).
Laggards: XRP (-0.6%) and APT (+0.2%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The news reports that 19 of 20 assets in the CoinDesk 20 Index are trading higher with AAVE up 7.4% and ETH up 2.9%, indicating overall positive market performance.
